Imonfire:

[indent]Welcome, Welcome to server number 2. You have chosen, or been chosen, to relocate to one of our finest remaining internet servers.
I thought so much of server number 2 that, I elected to establish my administrators here, for the black mesa site so thoughtfully provided by, our benefactors.
Whether you are here to stay, or just passing through on your way to troll the forums, welcome, to server number 2. Its faster here.[/indent]

I lol’d. Did you?

Yeah, I did, that was very well done!

item.title: Website fucked??
